featured.text: The baby panda Yuan Zai at the Taipei Zoo was separated from her mother because of a minor injury that occurred during her birth.
As the tallest building in the world, Taipei 101 has become a new ______ of Taipei City.
If you fly from Taipei to Tokyo, you’ll be taking an international, rather than a _____ flight.

definition.zh_def: 台北是台灣的首都，位於北部，是政治、經濟和文化的中心。
definition.en_def: Taipei is the capital of Taiwan, located in the north, and is the center of politics, economy, and culture.
definition.example: I visited Taipei last summer and enjoyed its vibrant night markets.
